title: Bert Is Worried About Purchasing A Gun...For Good Reason
description:
Bert thinks it's time for him to become a gun owner for the sake of his family's safety. But there's a lot he's worried about. If faced with the decision of having to harm someone, how will he live with the emotions that come with harming someone? We discuss.
